entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who is listening to a scream and a crash. (Excerpt: 'And then Harry heard a scream and a crash.')

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is sprawled on the floor with sherry bottles nearby. (Excerpt: 'The noise was coming from a corridor nearby; Harry sprinted towards it... saw Professor Trelawney sprawled upon the floor...')

entities.name: harry's wand
entities.description: Harry's magical wand, which he has at the ready. (Excerpt: 'his wand at the ready')

relationships.description: Harry helps Professor Trelawney to her feet after she has a fall. (Excerpt: 'Harry hurried forwards and helped Professor Trelawney to her feet.')
